summary: This module defines a collection of neural network components for a graph‑based recommendation model. It includes a text feature extractor that builds a vocabulary and converts raw text into numeric vectors, a scorer that computes similarity between items, a linear projector that transforms and aggregates node features, a GraphSAGE encoder that generates node embeddings from graph data, and a weighted GraphSAGE convolution that incorporates edge weights during message passing.
business_intent: Provide the building blocks needed to train and serve a PinSAGE‑style recommendation system that leverages both textual content and graph structure to produce item embeddings and relevance scores for personalized recommendations.
